about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey in Profiteer, a turn-based strategy game where your primary goal is to gain wealth by any means necessary. Utilize the diverse resources of the game world to build and expand your business empire.



Features:


  • Streamlined Gameplay: Maximize profits with minimalistic graphics and straightforward mechanics that emphasize strategic depth over complexity.
  • Diverse Resources: Manage four essential resources: Minerals, Wood, Oil, and Work-force to optimize your economic growth and outmaneuver competitors.
  • Challenging AI: Face off against a smart AI that anticipates your moves, ensuring each victory is both hard-fought and rewarding.
  • Dynamic World: Enjoy varied playthroughs with random world generation and multiple map settings, ensuring no two games are the same.
  • CO-OP Gameplay: Partner with friends in cooperative mode, combining your strategic minds to dominate the market together.
  • Extra Features: Experience the day and night cycle, hear the sounds of industry when your camera is near a factory, and discover other small details that bring the world of Profiteer to life.



Prepare to strategize, trade, and conquer in Profiteer—where every decision counts and fortune favors the shrewd.
